post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
The position, as part of a team, is responsible for support and analysis activities related to the suite of products supported within the Middleware group in CSS. The IT Analyst works within the team reporting to the IT Manager. The position is primarily responsible for the support of the WebSphere family of products ( WebSphere Application Server, WebSphere MQ etc.) and other related software.
MH: Websphere middleware support, web and application servers, windows or Unix NTH: J2EE and .Net``
Anita Yim Recruiter Computer Horizons Canada 2700 Matheson Blvd E. Suite 701, East Tower Mississauga, Ontario L4W-4V9
( 905-602-6085 ext 287 + anita@computerhorizons.ca Please visit our web site at www.computerhorizons.ca
post.title: Permanent position in Mississauga
